name: The Lion King
review_text: I like the part when Timon said the bug tasted like chicken. Haha how would he know? The rest of the movie was pretty good too.

name: Star Wars: Episode III – Revenge of the Sith
review_text: noooo anakin don’t turn to the dark side you’re so sexy aha

name: Se7en
review_text: my mom said that this is the scariest film shes ever seen and she saw it while she was pregnant with me, and im 100% convinced she could have gone into stress-induced labor during the opening credits sequence so...thanks david fincher for coming for my life before i was even born

name: The Incredibles
review_text: 14 years later i'm still the kid on the tricycle

name: Spider-Man: Homecoming
review_text: so, you got detention ‼️🤭 you screwed up 👎 you know what you did was wrong 😔 the question is, how are you going to make things right? 🤔🤔🤔 maybe you were trying to be cool 🤙 take it from a guy who's been frozen for 65 years ☃️❄️ the only way to really be cool is to follow the rules 🤓 we all know what's right ✅ we all know what's wrong ❌ next time those turkeys 🦃 try to convince you to do something that you know is wrong, just think to yourself, "what would captain america do?" 🇺🇸🤠✌️

name: Puss in Boots: The Last Wish
review_text: Everyone gangsta until The Big Bad Wolf starts whistling

name: Pulp Fiction
review_text: a good movie but god imagine my fucking disappointment when i found out the movie wasn't all about mia wallace nobody cares about you bruce willis

name: Everything Everywhere All at Once
review_text: easily one of the top 5 movies about taxes
